resources.string: Error authenticating your details.\r\nPlease try entering your information again or contact your cable provider to get access to this content.

You must update your Fire TV for the Hallmark app to work properly. To install the latest update, go to Settings > Device > About > Install System Update. If the problem persists, please contact Amazon Customer Service at Settings > Help > Contact Us.
You are not authorized to view this content.\r\nPlease contact your cable provider to get access to this content.
Service is unavailable. Please try again later.
You are not logged in. Select and play any video to log in.
Are you sure you want to logout?
Logout Successful.You shall soon be redirected to the details page.
Network is currently unavailable. Please try again later.
Error obtaining the registration code. Please dismiss this message and retry.
Go to your computer or mobile device
